meanings.definition: Relating to the measurement of volume.
meanings.sent1: The volumetric analysis showed the amount of space the liquid occupied.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician used a volumetric flask to measure the liquid accurately.
meanings.sent3: The volumetric calculations made the scientist feel like a math wizard.
meanings.sent4: Her volumetric understanding of the situation allowed her to see the bigger picture.
meanings.sent5: The volumetric measurements painted a clear picture of the container's capacity.

meanings.sent2: The volumetric data provided insights into the object's dimensions.
meanings.sent3: The volumetric experiment turned the classroom into a mini science lab.
meanings.sent4: His volumetric approach to the project ensured accurate results.
meanings.sent5: The volumetric analysis revealed the true size of the object.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the measurement of volume.
meanings.sent1: The volumetric properties of the material determined its density.
meanings.sent2: The volumetric calculations helped in understanding the object's capacity.
meanings.sent3: The volumetric measurements turned the boring task into a fun challenge.
